Key Match Events: Raphinha scored two penalties for Brazil in the 38th and 54th minutes.
Pereira scored for Brazil in the 71st minute.
Henrique scored for Brazil in the 74th minute.
Vanderson scored for Brazil in the 83rd minute.
Reyna received a yellow card in the 8th minute.
Gallese received a yellow card in the 45th minute.
Castillo received a yellow card in the 48th minute.
Zambrano received a yellow card in the 55th minute.
Cartagena received a yellow card in the 68th minute.
Pre-Game Insights: Brazil's manager Dorival Junior was under pressure before the match due to recent poor performances.
Brazil had a crucial win against Chile just before this match, which helped them stay in the automatic qualifying positions.
Peru moved off the bottom of the standings with their first win in the previous week.
Brazil had a run of five straight wins over Peru before this match.
